statements: SELECT * FROM clothing_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, item_id, rating FROM clothing_feedback WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM clothing_feedback WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM clothing_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, item_id, rating FROM clothing_feedback WHERE item_id = 2 AND rating < 4;
SELECT * FROM clothing_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT item_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM clothing_feedback GROUP BY item_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 5;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM clothing_feedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM clothing_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123 AND rating < 3;
SELECT customer_id, item_id, CONCAT('Rating: ', rating) AS feedback_info FROM clothing_feedback WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY item_id, customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_reviews WHERE rating > 3
SELECT item_name, brand_name, category FROM clothing_items
SELECT review_text, rating FROM clothing_reviews WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM clothing_reviews WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT item_id, brand_name FROM clothing_reviews JOIN clothing_items ON clothing_reviews.item_id = clothing_items.id
SELECT id, review_text, rating FROM clothing_reviews WHERE customer_id = 101
SELECT item_name, brand_name, category FROM clothing_items WHERE category = 'Shirts'
SELECT * FROM clothing_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY item_id DESC
SELECT item_name, brand_name, released_date FROM clothing_items WHERE released_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT id, review_text, rating, customer_id FROM clothing_reviews WHERE rating > 3 AND customer_id = 201 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT brand, price FROM clothing_items WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, rating, comment FROM feedback WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT customer_id, item_id, rating FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, brand, price FROM clothing_items WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customers.name, feedback.rating, feedback.comment FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id;

SELECT customers.name, clothing_items.item_name, feedback.rating FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id JOIN clothing_items ON feedback.item_id = clothing_items.item_id WHERE feedback.rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, brand_name, category FROM products WHERE brand_name = 'Nike';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, brand_name FROM products ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, brand_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, rating, review_text FROM customers c JOIN reviews r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id WHERE r.rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM ClothingBrands;
SELECT brand_name, established_date FROM ClothingBrands ORDER BY established_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM ClothingItems WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT brand_id, feedback FROM BrandsFeedback;
SELECT brand_name, established_date FROM ClothingBrands;
SELECT item_name, price FROM ClothingItems ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT brand_name, COUNT(*) as total_items FROM ClothingBrands LEFT JOIN ClothingItems ON ClothingBrands.brand_id = ClothingItems.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, r.rating, r.comments FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Reviews r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id;
